Text: vacation correction Cc Please add hours to Lindy Donoho p vacation carryover hours were incorrectly coded last year as vacation which was not taken Thanks in advance Fran Fagan Sr HR Rep Enron Transportation Services

RE Lindy Donoho Work ScheduleSorry I think so Original Message From Donoho Lindy Sent Tuesday February AM To Fagan Fran Subject RE Lindy Donoho Work Schedule Yes Ill be working a regular x schedule What voicemail Are you thinking of someone else Original Message From Fagan Fran Sent Tuesday February AM To Donoho Lindy Subject RE Lindy Donoho Work Schedule Are you going to be working a regular x schedule Did my voicemail address your question from yesterday Thanks Fran Original Message From Donoho Lindy Sent Tuesday February AM To Robertson Audrey Cc Fagan Fran Harris Steven Subject Lindy Donoho Work Schedule Effective March I will not be working the schedule anymore Please let me know if you need anything else from me Thanks Lindy

job descriptionRATES TARIFFS Provides support in one or more of the following areas Preparation of cost of services estimates Preparation of analyses exhibits and testimony to support rate cases certificate andor tariff applications Preparation of analyses and schedules for management presentations Monitoring FERC orders announcements and actions Maintenance of required file and regulatory information Fran Fagan Sr HR Rep Enron Transportation Services

Request to increase Dowds club dues reimbursement Cc In response to your request to increase Stephen Dowds club dues reimbursement above the month allowed by the program If you wish to have his club dues reimbursed through payroll then month is the maximum allowed per the policy Thanks Fran Fagan Sr HR Rep Enron Transportation Services

Club dues reimbursement Cc Per Danny McCartys request Please set up payroll reimbursement of club dues to the Met Club for Stephen Dowd Following is the information Name Stephen Dowd Title Director Corporate Development Effective Date Amount month pay period SS SAP P RCCost Center Please let me know if you need additional information Thanks Fran Fagan Sr HR Rep Enron Transportation Services

Performance Evaluation due datesLet me clarify a point about the Performance Evaluation due dates The written reviews are due in HR by January not signed off by employee You ARE NOT required to have completed all your employee review meetings by January You can start discussions as soon as you have completed the reviews but the discussion should focus around performance No variable pay or merit discussions should take place in the performance review meeting Those will take place on or around January Please call with any questions Thanks and have a great holiday Fran Fagan Sr HR Rep Enron Transportation Services

FW Karen Clapper Cc Lynn What do you think Thanks Fran Original Message From Southard Miranda Sent Wednesday November AM To Fagan Fran Subject RE Karen Clapper Do you want me to call it a transfer or a data correction Also what effective date should I use I think we should use Jan st for all corrections if we are changing company number to be on the safe side with regard to the employees tax deductions Let me know what you think We will probably get many cocost center change requests for the new year Thanks Miranda Original Message From Fagan Fran Sent Wednesday November AM To Southard Miranda Subject Karen Clapper Miranda please change Karen Clapper p company number to NNG and org unit to Thanks Fran Fagan Sr HR Rep Enron Transportation Services

RE PEP system Cc I have changed the supervisor from Lynn to you on Jacob Conklin and Cynthia Rivers in PEP I will submit the appropriate changes in SAP Thanks Fran Miranda Please change supervisor on Jacob Conklin and Cynthia Rivers to Sheila Nacey Please change the org unit to correspond to Sheilathx Original Message From Nacey Sheila Sent Tuesday November PM To Fagan Fran Subject PEP system Importance High Fran Two of my team members are not listed under me for the review process in PEP Jacob Conklin Cynthia Rivers Would you please check this out I assume they are still under Lynn Thks Sheila
contactLynn I can be reached at through Sunday and for the holidays Have a great time Fran Fagan Sr HR Rep Enron Transportation Services

resume Rob BakondyJust wanted to followup on Rob Bakondy to see if there is any interest His last day is Friday and Robert Jones VP HR ENW has asked for our assistance in checking out any available opportunities before he leaves For your convenience the resume is attached again below If I dont hear back Ill assume you have no interest in interviewing him Thanks Fran Fagan Sr HR Rep Enron Transportation Services

Training programKim Following is the course information for Becoming an Exceptional Leader As I thought it begins the day after you come back from vacation There are other offerings of this same course same teacher You can log onto httpelmenroncom and sign up for the one that suits your schedule One is offered October November and the other is November When you register it will say there is a wait list However they are in the process of adding a few more seats so you would probably get in Thanks Fran ETS HR is pleased to inform that the Becoming an Exceptional Leader program is returning this fall Arrangements have been made to offer this popular day development program October in Houston and we have once again secured Peter Maw to instruct the class Peter is considered the premiere instructor for this program and he is in very high demand The description of the program is provided below for your reference The cost of the program approximately per person will be charged back to each participants cost center Description Becoming an Exceptional Leader This program targets analytical and interpersonal problems that block productive managerial performance and is built around personal and confidential feedback provided from direct reports The course is based on research done over the last two decades on what differentiates high performers from their peers The program is practical personal conceptual tactical and focused on skill building Participants leave with knowledge of present stylestrengths areas for improvement specific tactics or howtos and a plan for future development Target Audience line managersdirectors team advisors functional managersdirectors vice presidents preferably anyone who has at least three employees reporting to them Length days of Participants Location Houston hotel TBD Cost Approximately per participant Instructor Peter Maw The Forum Corporation Enrollment Sasha Divelbiss
few more resumesKim Two more resumes from EBS folks Thanks Fran Fagan Sr HR Rep Enron Transportation Services

FW Resume Paul YBarboKim Attached is Paul YBarbos resume I have scheduled you for a am interview on Wednesday July th Ill bring him by Let me know of any scheduling conflicts Thanks Fran Original Message From YBarbo Paul Sent Thursday July AM To Fagan Fran Subject Resume Paul YBarbo Fran It was nice visiting with you this morning I am looking forward to meeting the commercial team at TW next week Attached is my resume for your information Regards Paul

FW All Domestic Employees who Participate in the Enron Corp Savings PlanOriginal Message From Enron NRON On Behalf Of Corporate NRON Sent Monday October PM To All Enron Employees United States NRON Subject To All Domestic Employees who Participate in the Enron Corp Savings Plan October is fast approaching Mark your calendar as the Enron Corp Savings Plan moves to a new administrator As a Savings Plan Participant Friday October at pm CST will be your last day to Transfer Investment Fund Balances and make Contribution Allocation Changes Change your Contribution Rate for the November th payroll deductions Enroll if you were hired before October TWO important reminders Vanguard Lifestrategy investment options are being replaced with Fidelity Freedom funds and Your funds will remain invested in the funds chosen as of pm CST until am November At am CST November the Savings Plan system reopens with great new features Should you need assistance during the transition period call ext and press Option This option will be available from am CST October until pm CST November Enron Benefits keeping pace with your lifestyle

Performance Evaluation due datesLet me clarify a point about the Performance Evaluation due dates The written reviews are due in HR by January not signed off by employee You ARE NOT required to have completed all your employee review meetings by January You can start discussions as soon as you have completed the reviews but the discussion should focus around performance No variable pay or merit discussions should take place in the performance review meeting Those will take place on or around January Please call with any questions Thanks and have a great holiday Fran Fagan Sr HR Rep Enron Transportation Services

update on withdrawal checksShelley Hewitt said the two k withdrawal checks one to your benefit at SmithBarney and one directly to you were generated on If you do not receive your check in the mail and if the SmithBarney check is not deposited by this coming Friday December let me know and Ill call them back and let them know Hope all is well Thanks Fran Fagan Sr HR Rep Enron Transportation Services

FW Org Chart Cc Shelley Attached are the org charts with no cost centers Should I forward these to Donnie Brown Thanks Fran Original Message From Blair Lynn Sent Thursday January PM To Fagan Fran Cc Corman Shelley January Steve Blair Lynn Subject Org Chart Fran Donnie Brown with Dynegy would like Shelleys Org Chart showing all the people that report to her Direct Reports The only one I had had cost center numbers on it and I wasnt sure we wanted to hand that out Could you please get us an Org Chart we can give to Dynegy He would like for us to email it to him at Since I will be out of the office tomorrow Shelley please let Fran know if you have any concerns with sending this information to him His reason for asking for it was to get a better feel for how the groups looked If you have some questions you can talk with Steve since he was in the meeting Thanks Lynn
